title: Directory Listings Workflow
description: Implement directory workflow: Startup → findDirectories() → Directory[] → createListings() → Listings. Auto-submit to Product Hunt, G2, Capterra, niche directories.

title: Service Agent Schema
description: Define ServiceAgent schema: AgentCapabilities, AgentWorkflow, HumanInLoop triggers, EscalationRules, QualityChecks. The autonomous worker that delivers the service.

title: Define API Schema
description: Create Zod schema for API abstraction: APISpec (OpenAPI/GraphQL/tRPC), Endpoint, Route, Authentication, RateLimiting, Versioning, Documentation. Support REST, GraphQL, and RPC patterns.

title: Implement ready/blocked queries
description: Port the ready_issues and blocked_issues views to Drizzle queries. Handle transitive blocking via parent-child relationships.
close_reason: Ready/blocked queries implemented in BeadsAdapter.getReadyIssues() and getBlockedIssues()

title: startup-builder Workflows
description: Implement workflows for startup-builder: idea → hypothesis → validate → build → test → launch. The complete lifecycle from idea generation through MVP validation and launch.

title: Define App Schema
description: Create Zod schema for App abstraction: AppType (web, mobile, desktop, cli, api), AppFramework, AppConfig, AppDeployment, AppAnalytics. Include runtime config, feature flags, and versioning.

title: Service Template Schema
description: Define ServiceTemplate schema: ServiceCategory, DeliveryMethod (AI-first, AI-assisted, AI-augmented), Deliverables, SLA, PricingTiers. Templates for common service patterns (consulting, audit, implementation).

title: Business-as-Code Core Architecture
description: Define all types, schemas, and workflows for building autonomous startups. This epic covers the complete Business-as-Code type system in startups.org.ai and the three builder workflows (startup-builder, service-builder, sales-builder).
design:
## Architecture Overview

Business-as-Code enables programmatic startup creation through a layered type system:

### Layer 1: Core Abstractions (startups.org.ai)
- **Ontology**: Occupation, Industry, Process, Task, Service, Product, Technology
- **Business Models**: Hypothesis, BusinessModel, PricingStrategy, ValueProposition
- **Frameworks**: LeanCanvas, StoryBrand, ProblemStack
- **Assets**: App, API, Site, Codebase, Infrastructure (to be added)
- **Startup**: Complete StartupConcept combining all above

### Layer 2: Builders (workflow orchestration)
- **startup-builder**: idea → hypothesis → validate → build → launch
- **service-builder**: template → agent → deliver → QA → invoice
- **sales-builder**: SEO → content → directories → social → outbound → nurture

### Layer 3: Execution (rpc.do integration)
- Each workflow function maps to an API endpoint
- Agents consume APIs to execute workflows autonomously
- Human-in-loop triggers for review/approval gates

### Key Design Principles
1. **Zod-first**: All types defined with .describe() for AI prompts
2. **Composable**: Small schemas combine into larger entities
3. **Autonomous**: Workflows designed for agent execution
4. **Observable**: Every step produces measurable output

title: Consolidate LeanCanvas Zod Schema
description: Export LeanCanvas as proper Zod schemas (currently TypeScript interfaces). Ensure consistency with startups.org.ai type system and add .describe() for AI prompts.

title: Funnel Analytics Schema
description: Define FunnelAnalytics schema: FunnelStage, ConversionMetrics, Attribution, CohortAnalysis, LTV/CAC tracking. Full-funnel measurement from awareness to revenue.

title: Build MVP Workflow
description: Implement MVP build workflow: ValidatedHypothesis → generateMVPSpec() → MVPSpec → buildMVP(). Define minimal feature sets, tech stack selection, and autonomous code generation triggers.

title: Validation Experiment Workflow
description: Implement validation workflow: Hypothesis → designExperiment() → Experiment → runExperiment() → ExperimentResult. Support landing page tests, customer interviews, concierge MVP patterns.

title: Beads TypeScript SDK with Drizzle
description: Create a TypeScript SDK for programmatic access to beads SQLite database using Drizzle ORM. Currently beads is CLI-only (Go binary). A TypeScript SDK would enable direct database access without spawning CLI processes, with full type safety.
design:
## Research Findings

### Current State
- **No TypeScript SDK exists** - Beads is CLI-only (Go binary wrapped in npm)
- **Programmatic access** requires spawning `bd` CLI as child process
- **SQLite schema** is well-defined with 10+ tables

### SQLite Schema (Core Tables)
```sql
issues (id, title, description, design, acceptance_criteria, notes, status, priority, issue_type, assignee, created_at, updated_at, closed_at, ...)
dependencies (issue_id, depends_on_id, type, created_at, created_by)
labels (issue_id, label)
comments (id, issue_id, author, text, created_at)
events (id, issue_id, event_type, actor, old_value, new_value, created_at)
```

### Implementation Plan
1. Create Drizzle schema matching beads SQLite structure
2. Export typed queries (CRUD operations)
3. Implement ready/blocked views as queries
4. Add JSONL sync utilities (optional)

### Location Options
- **tools.org.ai/integrations/beads** - Fits with other tool integrations
- **tools.org.ai/packages/issues** - As a new 'issues' aggregator
- **Standalone package** - beads-drizzle or @beads/drizzle
close_reason: Beads TypeScript SDK complete: schema + adapter in @tools.org.ai/beads, abstractions in business-as-code/entities/planning.ts

title: Add tools.org.ai as package submodule
description: Add primitives/tools (tools.org.ai) to pnpm-workspace.yaml so it can be used alongside other packages in the monorepo.

title: Service Quality Assurance Workflow
description: Implement QA workflow: ServiceOutput → validate() → QualityReport → approve/revise(). Automated quality gates with human review triggers for edge cases.

title: Idea Generation Workflow
description: Implement idea generation workflow: IdeaInput → generateIdeas() → Idea[]. Cross-product hypothesis × ontology dimensions to generate startup ideas at scale. Include scoring and ranking.

title: Service Delivery Workflow
description: Implement delivery workflow: ServiceRequest → intake() → scope() → execute() → review() → deliver(). End-to-end service delivery with agent orchestration.

title: sales-builder Documentation
description: Document sales-builder: SEO/AIO, content marketing, directory listings, social engagement, outbound email, inbound nurturing. Include channel strategy guides.

title: Service Pricing Engine
description: Implement pricing workflow: ServiceScope → calculatePrice() → Quote. Support value-based pricing, usage-based, subscription, and project-based models.

title: Extend DependencyType with discovered-from
description: Add 'discovered-from' to dependency types in digital-tasks. Enables provenance tracking: when working on Issue A, you discover Issue B. Matches beads dependency model.
close_reason: DependencyType includes discovered-from in schema.ts and planning.ts

title: Core Type System - Missing Abstractions
description: Add missing types to startups.org.ai: App, API, Site, Codebase, Database, Infrastructure. These primitives complete the Business-as-Code type system for representing all aspects of a startup's technical assets.

title: Create Drizzle schema for beads
description: Define Drizzle ORM schema matching beads SQLite: issues, dependencies, labels, comments, events tables. Include proper relations and indexes.

title: Define Codebase Schema
description: Create Zod schema for Codebase: Repository, Package, Module, Dependencies, BuildConfig, TestConfig, LintConfig. Model the complete software project structure.

title: Define Infrastructure Schema
description: Create Zod schema for Infrastructure: CloudProvider, DeploymentTarget, Database, Cache, Queue, Storage, CDN, DNS. Define IaC patterns for autonomous deployment.

title: Outbound Email Workflow
description: Implement outbound workflow: ICP → buildProspectList() → Prospects → generateSequence() → EmailSequence → execute(). Personalized cold outreach with AI-generated messaging.

title: Define Site Schema
description: Create Zod schema for Site abstraction: SiteType (landing, docs, blog, marketing), Pages, Navigation, SEO, Analytics, CMS integration. Support static generation and SSR patterns.

title: Documentation
description: MDX documentation for the Business-as-Code system. Document all types, schemas, workflows, and provide usage examples for each builder package.

title: sales-builder Workflows
description: Implement workflows for sales-builder: autonomous demand generation including SEO/AIO, Content Marketing, Directory Listings, Social Engagement, Outbound Email, and Inbound Nurturing. The growth engine for launching and scaling startups.

title: Pivot/Persevere Decision Workflow
description: Implement pivot analysis workflow: ExperimentResults → analyzePivot() → PivotDecision. Support all 10 Lean Startup pivot types with recommendations and next steps.

title: Add Issue abstraction to business-as-code
description: Add Issue entity that captures beads-like planning concepts: design (how to build), acceptance_criteria (what success looks like), notes (session context). Distinct from execution-focused Task in digital-tasks.
close_reason: Created WorkItem, Plan, Comment, Event entities in planning.ts with beads-compatible structure

title: Create beads integration in tools.org.ai
description: Create tools.org.ai/integrations/beads package with Drizzle schema and adapter that implements the Issue abstraction. Maps abstract Issue → beads SQLite tables.
close_reason: Created @tools.org.ai/beads with Drizzle schema and adapter

title: Core Types Documentation
description: Document all Zod schemas in startups.org.ai: Startup, Product, Service, App, API, Site, LeanCanvas, StoryBrand, etc. Include examples and usage patterns.

title: Content Marketing Workflow
description: Implement content workflow: ContentStrategy → generateContent() → Content → publish() → distribute(). Auto-generate blog posts, guides, case studies from startup/service context.

title: Social Engagement Workflow
description: Implement social workflow: ContentCalendar → generatePosts() → Post[] → schedule() → engage(). Multi-platform posting with audience-specific messaging (LinkedIn, Twitter, Reddit).

title: Service Catalog Generator
description: Implement catalog workflow: ServiceTemplates → generateCatalog() → ServiceCatalog. Auto-generate service offerings from occupation × process × overlay combinations.

title: startup-builder Documentation
description: Document startup-builder workflows: idea generation, hypothesis formulation, validation experiments, MVP building, launch. Include step-by-step guides.

title: SEO/AIO Content Strategy Schema
description: Define SEO schema: KeywordStrategy, ContentPlan, TopicCluster, SearchIntent, SERP analysis. Support both traditional SEO and AI Overview optimization (AIO).

title: Inbound Nurturing Workflow
description: Implement nurture workflow: Lead → segment() → NurtureTrack → executeSequence() → score() → handoff(). Lead scoring, email sequences, and sales handoff triggers.

title: Implement beads CRUD operations
description: Create typed functions: createIssue, updateIssue, closeIssue, addDependency, addLabel, addComment. Match bd CLI behavior.

title: Hypothesis Formulation Workflow
description: Implement hypothesis workflow: Idea → formulateHypothesis() → Hypothesis. Transform raw ideas into testable business hypotheses with clear success criteria and falsifiable assumptions.

title: service-builder Documentation
description: Document service-builder: service templates, delivery agents, pricing models. Show how to create AI-delivered Services-as-Software.

title: Consolidate StoryBrand Zod Schema
description: Export StoryBrand as proper Zod schemas (currently TypeScript interfaces). Add Problem (external/internal/philosophical) as reusable schema. Align with ProblemStack in enrichments.ts.

title: Channel Orchestration Engine
description: Implement orchestration: ChannelConfig[] → orchestrate() → CampaignPlan → execute() → optimize(). Coordinate multi-channel campaigns with budget allocation and A/B testing.

title: Add Plan abstraction
description: Add Plan entity for high-level planning that generates Issues. Includes design decisions, constraints, and success criteria. Bridges Strategy → Plan → Issues → Tasks workflow.
close_reason: Plan entity created in planning.ts with objectives, constraints, approach, decisions

title: service-builder Workflows
description: Implement workflows for service-builder: AI-delivered Services-as-Software. Define service templates, delivery agents, pricing tiers, and the automation layer for productized consulting/agency services.

title: Launch Workflow
description: Implement launch workflow: MVP → prepareLaunch() → LaunchPlan → launch(). Include domain setup, deployment, analytics integration, and initial marketing asset generation.
